page.title: 06SERVICES IN GRANTOWN 2
page.content:
As well as being a centre for local shoppers Grantown-on-Spey is also a shopping centre for tourists and holidaymakers.
Among the shops catering mainly for tourists there are two shops selling high quality gifts and one antique shop. Another shop has recently opened selling leather goods.
For those more interested in outdoor recreation there are two fishing tackle shops, which also sell fishiong permits for the local waters. Speyside Sports offers a wider range of sports goods, mainly for golf, tennis and skiing. During the season it is also possible to hire skiing equipment. The local golf club also carries a range of clubs and accessories.
